item.title: 德国莱茵金属公司获上调目标，汇丰银行看好消费热潮
item.description: 德国防务公司莱茵金属公司（Rheinmetall AG）的目标股价不断攀升，汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）预期欧洲将掀起一波军费开支浪潮，因此将目标股价提高到了新的纪录。【原文：Price targets for German defense firm Rheinmetall AG are climbing, with HSBC Holdings Plc raising the bar to a new record in anticipation of a wave of European military spending.】

item.title: 中国股票是 Man Group's Cole 最看好的投资品种
item.description: 对 Man Group 的多策略股票主管来说，中国股票是今年最有把握的交易之一，他预计，谷底股价和对中国人工智能创新的重新认识将推动投资反弹。【原文：Chinese stocks are among this year’s highest conviction trades for Man Group’s head of multi-strategy equities, who expects rock-bottom share prices and a fresh appreciation for China’s artificial-intelligence innovations to drive an investment rebound.】

item.title: Tether 表示已获得尤文图斯足球俱乐部的少数股权
item.description: Tether Holdings SA de CV 表示，它已经收购了尤文图斯足球俱乐部（Juventus Football Club SpA）的少数股权，作为加密货币中最有价值的公司之一，它将继续分散其投资组合。【原文：Tether Holdings SA de CV said it’s acquired a minority stake in Juventus Football Club SpA, as one of crypto’s most valuable companies continues to diversify its investment portfolio.】

item.title: 气温降低推动美国工业生产增长
item.description: 美国 1 月份工业生产增幅超过预期，这主要得益于在气温较低的月份里公用事业用量的增加，而机动车产量的大幅下降则抑制了制造业的发展。【原文：US industrial production rose in January by more than forecast, boosted by utilities usage in a month marked by colder temperatures, while a sharp decline in motor vehicle output restrained manufacturing.】

item.title: 超级碗减肥广告显示山寨风险，诺和诺德股价受挫
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）的股价将创下今年以来最差的一周，此前超级碗上一则兜售山寨产品的广告凸显了该公司的减肥特效药所面临的挑战。【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S shares are on track for their worst week this year, after a Super Bowl advertisement touting copycat products underscored the challenge to its weight-loss blockbuster drug.】

item.title: EON 首席执行官称欧洲能源安全日益受到威胁
item.description: EON SE 首席执行官 Leonhard Birnbaum 表示，欧洲能源供应的安全比以往任何时候都更具挑战性，并列举了乌克兰基础设施遭受攻击和网络威胁的例子。【原文：The security of Europe’s energy supply is more challenging than ever, EON SE Chief Executive Officer Leonhard Birnbaum said, pointing to attacks on Ukrainian infrastructure and cyber threats as examples.】

item.title: 巴西债券市场在经历 12 月的衰退后获得复苏动力
item.description: 在对巴西支出计划的担忧引发大幅抛售之后，基金经理们又开始涉足巴西资产，精挑细选 Raizen 和 Usiminas 等公司的美元债券。【原文：Money managers are tipping their toes back into Brazilian assets, cherry-picking dollar bonds of companies like Raizen and Usiminas following a deep selloff spurred by concerns over the country’s spending plans.】

item.title: 一分钱猎人希望通过融化赌注从特朗普硬币袭击中获利
item.description: 亚当-杨斯希望从一卡车的 "小红分 "中赚大钱。【原文：Adam Youngs is looking to make a lot from truckloads of the little red cent.】

item.title: 美国零售额在火灾和风暴中创下两年来最大降幅
item.description: 美国 1 月份的零售额创下近两年来的最大降幅，表明消费者在经历了 2024 年最后几个月的消费狂潮后突然回落。【原文：US retail sales slumped in January by the most in nearly two years, indicating an abrupt pullback by consumers after a spending spree in the closing months of 2024.】

item.title: 摩根大通正与投资者洽谈联合游戏债务再融资事宜
item.description: 据知情人士透露，摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is talking to investors to refinance slot machine operator United Gaming LLC’s private credit debt, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 挪威将为北极岛屿架设数据电缆以加强安全
item.description: 挪威计划与斯瓦尔巴群岛和扬马延岛等北极群岛建立新的海底数据连接，部分原因是为了改善北欧邻国俄罗斯的国家防御能力。【原文：Norway plans to build a new undersea data connection with the Arctic archipelagos of Svalbard and Jan Mayen, partly to improve the national defenses of Russia’s Nordic neighbor.】

item.title: 印度法院裁定信实公司在天然气钻探纠纷中败诉
item.description: 据诉讼方的一名代理律师称，印度一家法院周五在一场持续了十多年的天然气钻探纠纷中，判决亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）的信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Ltd.）及其合作伙伴英国石油公司（BP Plc）败诉。【原文：An Indian court Friday ruled against billionaire Mukesh Ambani’s Reliance Industries Ltd. and its partner BP Plc in a gas drilling dispute that’s been going on for more than a decade, according to a lawyer representing the litigant.】

item.title: 交易员押注 5%的美国收益率，期待 1000 万美元的回报
item.description: 期权交易商纷纷押注 10 年期国债收益率将在未来五周内跃升至 5%，而这一水平上一次出现还是在 2023 年。【原文：Options traders are piling into bets the 10-year Treasury yield will jump to 5% — a level last seen in 2023 — within the next five weeks.】

item.title: 加纳总统表示，加纳正在与国际货币基金组织（IMF）谈判，以完善其计划
item.description: 加纳总统约翰-马哈马在接受采访时说，加纳新政府已开始与国际货币基金组织谈判，以完善其 30 亿美元的救助计划，解决人们对雄心勃勃的收入目标的担忧。【原文：Ghana’s new administration has started talks with the International Monetary Fund to refine its $3 billion bailout program to address concerns over ambitious revenue targets, President John Mahama said in an interview.】

item.title: 欧洲议员敦促因刚果战争冻结对卢旺达的援助
item.description: 欧盟立法者呼吁停止对卢旺达的财政援助，因为卢旺达支持邻国刚果民主共和国的 M23 叛乱运动。【原文：European Union lawmakers called for a halt to financial assistance for Rwanda because of its support for the M23 rebel insurgency in neighboring Democratic Republic of Congo.】

item.title: 受赛诺菲收购案牵连的银行面临痛苦的出售等待
item.description: 去年，为了从欧洲最大的收购债务交易中分得一杯羹，交易饥渴的银行排队做出让步。这些银行还将自己的资产负债表免费出租给 Clayton Dubilier & Rice 公司。【原文：Deal-starved banks lined up to make concessions to get a slice of Europe’s biggest buyout debt deal last year. They also put themselves in a position where their balance sheets are in effect being rented out for free by Clayton Dubilier & Rice.】

item.title: 华尔街 2025 年迄今为止的主要趋势
item.description: 今年还早，但华尔街本周的动向表明，有几个重要趋势值得关注。【原文：The year is still young, but moves on Wall Street this week point to a couple of important trends to keep an eye on.】

item.title: 英镑攀升至 2025 年高点，开年表现在同类货币中最差
item.description: 英镑兑美元汇率攀升至今年最高水平，原因是交易商回补了在 1 月份大跌期间建立的空头头寸。【原文：The pound climbed to its highest level this year against the dollar as traders covered short positions built up during a selloff in January.】

item.description:

item.title: KKR 为房地产信贷基金融资逾 8.5 亿美元
item.description: KKR & Co.为机会型房地产信贷基金募集了超过 8.5 亿美元的资金，因为投资者看到了房地产交易融资的成熟时机。【原文：KKR & Co. raised more than $850 million for an opportunistic real estate credit fund as investors see a ripening moment for financing property deals.】

item.title: 俄罗斯银行将利率维持在通胀斗争中的历史最高水平
item.description: 俄罗斯央行在第二次会议上将借贷成本维持在了历史最高水平，但对在下次会议上收紧货币政策以应对持续通胀的前景持开放态度。【原文：Russia’s central bank kept borrowing costs at a record high for the second meeting, though held open the prospect it could tighten monetary policy at its next meeting to fight persistent inflation.】

item.title: 本周美国通胀恐慌之后，债券交易员保持警惕
item.description: 在经历了动荡的一周之后，美国国债周五趋于稳定，交易员们面对的现实是，再次降息可能要等很长时间。【原文：US Treasuries stabilized on Friday after a turbulent week that saw traders confronted by the reality another interest-rate cut could be a long time coming.】

Yet for investors thinking about diving into the electric-vehicle maker’s shares, Wall Street has a message: buyer beware.】

item.title: 1,680 亿美元外资流出，中国外资流出创历史新高
item.description: 去年，中国的外商直接投资流出量创下历史新高，在与美国重启贸易战之后，这种外流可能会持续下去。【原文：China saw record outflows of foreign direct investment last year, an exodus that threatens to persist after the resumption of a trade war with the US.】

item.title: 安联国际在十年大跌中押注土耳其里拉债券
item.description: 安联全球投资公司（Allianz Global Investors）坚持押注土耳其期限最长的地方债务，这使其成为以十年来最快速度抛售里拉债券的外国投资者中的异类。【原文：Allianz Global Investors is sticking with its bet on Turkey’s longest-maturity local debt, making it an outlier among foreign investors who’ve unloaded lira bonds at the fastest pace in a decade.】
